channel.title: Homes on Caterina Urban
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Caterina Urban

item.description: **I am always looking for strong and motivated PhD students and postdocs to work with me on formal verification methods for data science and machine learning software. Contact me if interested!** -- **contact me if interested!** -- üì¢ I have open PhD (starting Fall 2026) positions! I am a member of the INRIA research team ANTIQUE (ANalyse StaTIQUE). Previously, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Chair of Programming Methodology, led by Peter M√ºller at ETH Zurich.
